h2_title: Yellow-Robed Squire Boss Fight and Guide
content: While not technically a Yaoguai Chief, the Drunk Boar isn’t a pushover like the Man-in-Stone. He’s fairly formidable in his own right, and you’ll need to learn his attacks to win the duel. The Yellow-Robed Squire is a big fan of hurling dust clouds in your direction to mask his movements, and you’ll need to be even more reactive than usual to make sure you don’t get blindsided.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow-Robed_Squire.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow-Robed Squire', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow-Robed Squire Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
While not technically a Yaoguai Chief, the Drunk Boar isn’t a pushover like the Man-in-Stone. He’s fairly formidable in his own right, and you’ll need to learn his attacks to win the duel. The Yellow-Robed Squire is a big fan of hurling dust clouds in your direction to mask his movements, and you’ll need to be even more reactive than usual to make sure you don’t get blindsided.
